Summary: bright light appears everynight. same location. descends downward or fades out before reaching treeline
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside in the driveway. first noticed it on july,262013. it started appearing ever few nights and now its everynight.it fisrt started showing up around 9-9:30pm and lasting for 45 minutes. now it around 8:30pm and lasts between 30mins to an hour in my view. when it fades completly away are the shorter times.
